title: OpenProject Pricing - from €0. Start your free trial now.
content: OpenProject offers various pricing plans, including a free Community edition and several paid Enterprise options for both cloud and on-premises hosting. The Community Edition is free and self-managed, offering unlimited users and basic features. Cloud Edition plans include Basic, Professional, and Premium, with pricing per user per month and minimum user requirements. The On-premises Edition offers additional add-ons and support, with pricing starting from €5 per user per month. An 'Enterprise' plan is also available with pricing upon request. The pricing page details features, support levels, add-ons, hosting options, user increments, subscription periods, and discounts. A feature comparison table outlines what is included in each plan, covering aspects like project management, agile boards, time tracking, budgeting, integrations, and security features. A FAQ section addresses common questions about pricing, editions, trials, payment, and user management.
